name: Larry is the boss
description:
Plot:

You control Ankle Breaker, who wants to take revenge on his archnemesis Larry, founder of Larry & Co. Your mission will be to take all his money and destroy it in his face and escape as soon as possible.

This game based on the ol' raycasting games like Doom or Wolfenstein. My first game made with a 3d game engine that it's not GameMaker.

Other games:

Ankle Breaker's Den
